\newcommand{\vBB}{\vec{\mathcal{B}}}
\newcommand{\vEE}{\vec{\mathcal{E}}}
\newco

%mdk-data-line={25}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[897069586463aa5d62c798d577b25811]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={28}
\vb{E} = \va{\mathcal{E}} e^{i\vb{k} \cdot \vb{x} - i\omega t}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[e5698db7073d212b4001a77dd8ad0bd4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={32}
k = \omega \sqrt{\epsilon \mu}
\qquad
v = \frac{1}{\sqrt{\epsilon \mu}} = \frac{\omega}{k} \equiv \frac{c}{n}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={37}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1a58f249932a2915e61842f01ae0feca]%mdk
$n,$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={37}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[9ea67053941bea833ffea3ecd8378642]%mdk
$c = 1/\sqrt{\epsilon_0\mu_0}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={37}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[45c61f2c5d8072b124319e48aa14d2f1]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={40}
n = \sqrt{\frac{\mu\epsilon}{\mu_0\epsilon_0}}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={43}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3177c3b789270ed3013a4e6066f64dd6]%mdk
$\vb{E}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={43}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[747027acd0dae1ded660f1e5eb13e878]%mdk
$\vb{B}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={43}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[71db51a338fa7bcd009dc0f2d9615195]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={46}
\vb{B} = \va{\mathcal{B}} e^{i\vb{k} \cdot \vb{x} - i\omega t}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1aa9819f174eb98ac1efd83f003c3896]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={50}
\hat{\vb{n}} \cdot \va{\mathcal{E}} = \hat{\vb{n}} \cdot \va{\mathcal{B}} = \vb{0}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={53}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[449e08d3bbe2c5acc0a2daa85a93464c]%mdk
$\hat{\vb{n}}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={53}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ec088461d9c40db16baae02ac4b5ed87]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={56}
\vBB = \sqrt{\epsilon\mu}\ \hat{\vb{n}} \times \va{\mathcal{E}}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={59}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b9ecba80b09dd2783868e27d65c93a93]%mdk
